recipe_name: Cucumber ribbon salad with olive and caper dressing
author: Maria Elia
method: Place all of the ingredients except the cucumber in a food processor and pulse until smooth.  Place the cucumber ribbons into a bowl and drizzle over the dressing. Toss well to coat then transfer to a plate to serve.
ingredients: 2 red peppers from a jar,  1 tbsp black olives,  2 tbsp capers, drained,  3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  ½ lemon, juice only,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley ,  ½ cucumber, de-seeded and cut into ribbons with a peeler
